plot: Henry tries to find out what really happened to Abigail after she left him.

Henry gets a lead on Abigail his wife who left him when she started to age and he didn't. When he gets to where he thinks she is, he finds a body but it's not Abigail. So he and Jo investigate problem is that it's not in their jurisdiction. They have to deal with a judge and the sheriff of the town where the body was found. They learn that the body is of a girl who was brought in to the hospital where Abigail was working. They learn that the girl was running away from an abusive boyfriend. They also learn that on the same night the girl was brought in a man who was riding a motorcycle was struck and brought to the same hospital. They eventually learn who the boyfriend is and who struck the motorcyclist but neither of them had anything to do with what happened to Abigail. So what happened to her.—rcs0411@yahoo.com
